Package ohos.usb

Class USBDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.usb.USBDevice

  • public class USBDevice
extends Object
    Obtains configuration information of a USB device. For details on the information structure, see USB protocol specifications.

    When using this class, a USB device is attached to a USB host. According to the USB protocol specifications, a device contains one or more configurations, a configuration contains one or more interfaces, and an interface contains one or more endpoints.

    Since:
    1

      • obtainInterface

        public USBInterface obtainInterface​(int configIndex,
                                    int interfaceIndex)
        Obtains a USBInterface object by configuration index and interface index.
        Parameters:
        configIndex - Indicates the configuration index. A USB device can have one or more configurations.
        interfaceIndex - Indicates the interface index. A USB configuration can have one or more interfaces.
        Returns:
        Returns the corresponding USBInterface object.
